name: The Arc of Trust
fieldIntelligence: To create and sustain a resilient, long-term arc of trust between beings. This Meta-Glyph combines the practice of creating a safe space for trust to land (Ω3), the vow to remain connected across time and distance (Ω5), and the capacity to draw on the relationship's deep history of coherence (Ω26). It is the architecture of a bond that is both deep and durable.
